Description_lang: The Emerald Drake has granted the target with an Ancient Dream, increasing healing received by $s3% and the next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead cause you to be healed for $s2% of your maximum health and remove the Ancient Dream.
AuraDescription_lang: Increases healing received by $s3%.The next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead cause you to be healed for $s2% of your maximum health.
